body:
Overview

The Candidates list within the test interface allows you to conveniently access the information of all invited candidates, including those currently at various stages of the test. It provides a centralized location to view their entries and reports effortlessly.

Accessing Candidates List

  • To access the candidate list, click the Candidates option from the test interface, as shown in the screenshot below.
  • A list of candidates who have historically been invited or participated in that particular test is visible on your screen. 
  • You can search for a candidate by their name or email address using the search bar. 
  • You can filter the candidates on the left pane using the given default filters.
  • You can also add a separate filter by clicking the Add Column button in the filters section.

Accessing Candidate Reports

  • You can access the candidate’s Summary Report by clicking on their name.  
  • Upon clicking on a candidate’s name, their report will appear on the right side of the screen as shown below.
  • You can click on the question name or View detailed to access the detailed report of a candidate’s test attempt.  
  • You can learn more about the functionality of the Test Summary Report from here.
title: Candidates List in HackerRank Tests
